mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productNum, productName, price, stock, content, reserves, imageFilename, categoryNum, userId, division, created_date,countDate) VALUES( product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{content}, #{reserves, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryNum},#{userId}, #{division}, SYSDATE, #{countDate})

SELECT productNum, productName, price, stock, p.userId, imageFileName, c.categoryNum, c.categoryName, division, TO_CHAR(p.countDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') countDate, TO_CHAR(p.created_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') created_date FROM product p JOIN category c ON p.categoryNum=c.categoryNum where division=2 and p.userId=#{userId}
ORDER BY productNum OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM product p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId = m.userId

SELECT productNum, productName, p.userId, m.userName, stock, price, imageFileName, c.categoryNum, division, p.categoryNum,c.categoryName, TO_CHAR(p.created_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') created_date, content FROM product p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId=m.userId JOIN category c ON p.categoryNum=c.categoryNum WHERE productNum=#{productNum}
